mapper.delete: delete from user_collect where id = #{id} and user_account = #{account}
mapper.insert: insert into user_collect (user_account, class_id, port_id, collect_time) values (#{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{portId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{collectTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select id, user_account, class_id, port_id, collect_time from user_collect
